p: Evidence is now emerging that lectins are dynamic contributors to tumor cell recognition (surface markers), cell adhesion and localization, signal transduction across membranes, mitogenic stimulation, augmentation of host immune defense, cytotoxicity, and apoptosis [ 38]. A review by De Mejia and Prisecaru (2005) provides a comprehensive appraisal of the inhibitory effects of plant lectins on malignant cells in vitro and vivo [ 39].
